name: Verify Date, Type of leave and Reason fields are mandatory

testSteps.description: 1: Verify Date, Type of leave and Reason fields are mandatory ({parentTab=Leave Management, childTab=Apply, tab=LWP Change Request, heading=Apply Leave / WFH / Comp Off / Out Duty / Change Request})

children.description: Given User is logged into MIS
When User is on MIS Home Page
When User clicks on "Apply" sub tab of "Leave Management" tab
And Verify "Apply Leave / WFH / Comp Off / Out Duty / Change Request" of "Apply" tab
When User clicks on "LWP Change Request" Tab
Then Click on Submit button for LWP tab
Then Verify "legitimate Reason" text box is mandatory field
Then Verify "legitimate Type,from Date" dropdown is mandatory field

userStory.narrative: This tests are for Apply module of MIS Beta

title: Verify Date, Type of leave and Reason fields are mandatory

values: Apply Leave / WFH / Comp Off / Out Duty / Change Request
